responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "4D52F94F4AB9B8BC772394BA667D1034", "We\'ve found a way through these caverns to a safer haven outside the walls of these ruins. Better, we think, to retake our ancestral home from a safer vantage. Yet these strange animal-men harass us constantly. We\'re not sure what they\'re seeking but they are savage in their intent, whatever it is. You shouldn\'t tarry here too long. I can hold this camp. Chieftain Sanvi Theran is organizing the newcomers in Bonfire, they will point you to where you can be most useful.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_MalaeKelori_6_Response
